attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make a referendum mandatory for any non defensive wars. Like for example the Iraq  war went ahead even against the majority public's wishes.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a name.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/referendumofwar/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
